Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF 1292 ANNULLED
BNSF train #1292, scheduled to depart Aurora at 6:05 PM, will not operate due to an operational incident. Train #1294, scheduled to depart Aurora at 7:05 PM will accommodate  passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN #2139 - Will Not Operate Past Libertyville
MDN train #2139 scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 6:42 PM will not operate past Libertyville due to earlier police activity. Train #2151 will accommodate customers toward Fox Lake.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
MDN 2156 - Origin Change
MDN train #2156, scheduled to depart Grayslake at 7:33 PM, will originate at Lake Forest due to police activity.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Trains Back On The Move

MDN - Tracks have been released for train movement, inbound and outbound trains are back on the move and may be operating with extensive delays due to earlier police activity. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN 2131 - On The Move Delayed
MDN train #2131, scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 5:52 PM, is on the move, making stops to Fox Lake, and operating with extensive delays due to police activity.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN #2135 - Will Not Operate Past Libertyville
MDN train #2135 scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 6:21 PM will not operate past Libertyville due to earlier police activity. Train #2151 will accommodate customers toward Fox Lake.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The Ivanhoe elevator is out of service.
The Ivanhoe elevator is out of service.  Customers can use 147th Street/Sibley or 115th Street/Kensington as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service.
The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service. Customers can use 79th Street/Chatham or 103rd Street/Roosmoor as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St./Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN #2147 - Will Not Operate
MDN train #2147 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 6:32 PM will not operate due to earlier police activity. Train #2151 will accommodate customers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Entry Closed - Canopies Refurbished

Passengers will not have access to east station and east parking lot platform entry November 10 through winter 2026 at University Park while canopies are being refurbished. Passengers have full access to west station and west parking lot platform entry.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN #2153 - Will Not Operate Past Northbrook
MDN train #2153 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 8:32 PM will not operate past Northbrook due to earlier police activity. Train #2155 will accommodate customers toward Fox Lake.
